## ⭐Features
-⚙️ - Fully Declarative OS
-❄️ - Inbuilt Flake Support
-🐱 - Catppuccin Theming
-🍚 - Clear Setting Separation
-🪟 - Full Hyprland Setup

-☑️ - Build in dotfiles
